Class Tetrahedron

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
      • ThreeDimensionalShape
        • Tetrahedron
  • public class Tetrahedron
extends ThreeDimensionalShape
    A simple 3D shape that is defined by the length of a single edge

      private double edgeLength
      Length of a single edge
